body_html:
Discussed offline.
I will need to reintroduce a way to disable building these into our build system.
I am thinking having these default on, but having --config options such as noaws, nogcp, nohdfs and nokafka
What do you think?
body_text:
Discussed offline.
I will need to reintroduce a way to disable building these into our build system.
I am thinking having these default on, but having --config options such as noaws, nogcp, nohdfs and nokafka
What do you think?
body:
Discussed offline.
I will need to reintroduce a way to disable building these into our build system.
I am thinking having these default on, but having `--config` options such as `noaws`, `nogcp`, `nohdfs` and `nokafka`
What do you think?
